name: Frontly
title: Frontly - Build custom apps with no code
payoff: Build with AI. Edit with no code.
shortDescription: Frontly enables users to create custom applications without any coding knowledge, leveraging AI to simplify the process. It is designed for entrepreneurs, small businesses, and non-technical users who need to quickly develop functional apps. An example use case could be a small business owner creating an internal tool to manage inventory and process orders efficiently.
pros: No coding required to build apps
cons: Limited customization compared to traditional coding
May not handle very complex app requirements
Dependent on the platform for updates and new features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Retool
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers more control with low-code options

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bubble
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on complete no-code web apps
